          <title>
            <string language="en">Earth moving around the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse, die um die Sonne bewegt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La terre se déplaçant autour du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra que move-se em torno do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra che si muove intorno al sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη που κινείται γύρω από τον ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra que se mueve alrededor del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that as the Earth moves around the Sun with some velocity, it experiences a gravitational pull of the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational pull</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß als die Masse um die 
Sonne mit etwas Geschwindigkeit bewegt, es erfährt eine 
Gravitationszugkraft der Sonne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que comme terre se 
déplace autour du soleil avec une certaine vitesse, il éprouve une 
gravitation du soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que como a terra se move
em torno do sol com alguma velocidade, ele experimenta uma tração 
gravitacional do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che come la terra si 
muove intorno al sole con una certa velocità, esso avverte una 
attrazione gravitazionale del sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ως γήινες κινήσεις 
γύρω από τον ήλιο με κάποια ταχύτητα, δοκιμάζει ένα βαρύτητας 
τράβηγμα του ήλιου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que como la tierra se 
mueve alrededor del sol con una cierta velocidad, él experimenta una 
gravitación del sol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
